titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4340) to implement the United States-Bahrain Free Trade Agreement.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-328, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Sec. 2. During consideration of H.R. 4340 pursuant to this resolution, notwithstanding the operation of the previous question, the Chair may postponefurther consideration of the bill to a time designated by the Speaker in conconance with section 151 of the Trade Act of 1974.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 127.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 583.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/7/2005--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4340) to implement the United States-Bahrain Free Trade Agreement.
